notFound.title: 404 - Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you requested does not exist or you do not have permission to view it.

errorPage.title: Something went wrong
suggestions: Try again in a few minutes
Contact support if the problem persists

messages.network: We're having trouble connecting to our servers. Please check your internet connection and try again.
messages.timeout: The request took too long to complete. Please try again later when the server might be less busy.
messages.permission: You don't have permission to access this resource. Please log in or contact an administrator.
messages.generic: We've encountered an unexpected error. Our team has been notified and we're working to fix it.
